properties.name: height
properties.description: Height to be set for the container.

properties.name: width
properties.description: Width to be set for the container.

aggregations.name: actionButtons
aggregations.description: This aggregation contains the actions that should be displayed within the container.

aggregations.description: The container content aggregation which should be of type BasePanel.

aggregations.description: This aggregation holds the items that should be shown within the dropdown menu of the container.

symbols.name: sap.cux.home.BaseLayout
symbols.description: Abstract base class for My Home layout.

properties.name: persContainerId
properties.description:
Container ID for Ushell Personalisation.
This property holds the ID of the personalization container.
It is used to store and retrieve personalized settings for the control.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID for the new control, generated automatically if an ID is not provided

parameters.name: settings
parameters.description: Initial settings for the new control

constructor.description: Constructor for a new Base Layout.

methods.name: setSettingsDialog
methods.description:
Sets SettingsDialog aggregation. Overridden to update cached settings panels. Sets the aggregated settingsDialog.
The settings dialog aggregation which controls settings for my home controls. It should be of type BaseSettingsDialog. If Not provided, a default settings dialog will be created from sap.cux.home.SettingsDialog. In case of only custom settings panels, the settings dialog should be created and set manually from sap.cux.home.SettingsDialog.

symbols.name: sap.cux.home.BasePanel
symbols.description: Abstract base class for all panels placed in {@link sap.cux.home.BaseContainer }.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID for the new control, generated automatically if an ID is not provided

parameters.name: settings
parameters.description: Initial settings for the new control

constructor.description: Constructor for a new Base Panel.

symbols.name: sap.cux.home.BaseSettingsDialog
symbols.description: Abstract base class for custom settings dialog for {@link sap.cux.home.BaseLayout }.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID for the new control, generated automatically if an ID is not provided

parameters.name: settings
parameters.description: Initial settings for the new control

constructor.description: Constructor for a new Base Settings Dialog.

methods.name: addPanel
methods.description:
Adds a new panel at the end of the available panels. Overridden to update cached panels. Adds some panel to the aggregation "panels".
Contains the panels aggregation and should be of type BaseSettingsPanel.

methods.name: getPanels
methods.description:
Returns all the panels in the dialog. Overridden to return cached panels. Gets content of aggregation "panels".
Contains the panels aggregation and should be of type BaseSettingsPanel.

methods.name: insertPanel

parameters.name: panel
parameters.description: The panel to insert.

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: The index at which to insert the panel.

methods.description:
Adds a new panel to the 'panels' aggregation at the index. Overridden to update cached panels. Inserts a panel into the aggregation "panels".
Contains the panels aggregation and should be of type BaseSettingsPanel.

methods.name: removeAllPanels

returnValue.description: An empty array representing the removed panels.

methods.description:
Removes all panels from the dialog, clears the internal panel cache. Overridden to update cached panels. Removes all the controls from the aggregation "panels". Additionally, it unregisters them from the hosting UIArea.
Contains the panels aggregation and should be of type BaseSettingsPanel.

methods.name: removePanel

parameters.name: panel
parameters.description: - The panel to remove.

methods.description:
Removes a panel from the dialog and updates the cache. Removes a panel from the aggregation "panels".
Contains the panels aggregation and should be of type BaseSettingsPanel.

symbols.name: sap.cux.home.BaseSettingsPanel
symbols.description: Abstract base class for panels inside My Home Settings Dialog.

parameters.name: id

parameters.description: Initial settings for the new control

methods.name: addActionButton

returnValue.description: The instance of the panel for chaining.

parameters.name: button
parameters.description: - The button to add.

methods.description: Adds an action button to the panel.

methods.name: addKeyUserChanges
methods.description: Add Changes made by user in case of KeyUser Settings Panel.

methods.name: clearKeyUserChanges
methods.description: Clear all KeyUser Changes made by user.

methods.name: getActionButtons
methods.description: Retrieves the action buttons from the panel.

methods.name: getKeyUserChanges
methods.description: Returns the KeyUser Changes made by user.

methods.name: insertActionButton

returnValue.description: The instance of the panel for chaining.

parameters.name: button
parameters.description: - The button to insert.

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: - The index at which to insert the button.

methods.description: Inserts an action button at a specific index in the panel.

methods.name: isSupported

returnValue.description: A promise that resolves to true if the panel is supported.

methods.description: Checks if the panel is supported. To be overridden by subclasses.

methods.name: removeActionButton

returnValue.description: The removed button or null if not found.

parameters.name: button
parameters.description: - The button to remove.

methods.description: Removes an action button from the panel.

symbols.name: sap.cux.home.CardsPanel
symbols.description: Panel class for managing and storing Insights Cards.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID for the new control, generated automatically if an ID is not provided

parameters.name: settings
parameters.description: Initial settings for the new control

constructor.description: Constructor for a new card panel.

methods.name: refreshData

returnValue.description: A promise that resolves once the Insights Cards section has been refreshed.

methods.description:
Triggers a full refresh of the Insights Cards's data and UI.
Reloads all the user cards within the Insights Cards section by reinitializing relevant services and re-rendering the panel.

symbols.name: sap.cux.home.IToDoPanel
symbols.description: Common Interface for creating To-Do Panels displayed in the {@link sap.cux.home.ToDosContainer }.

methods.name: generateCardTemplate

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID for the template.

parameters.name: context
parameters.description: The context required for the template.

methods.description:
Generate a default card template for the To Do Panel.
An extended panel can have it's own template by overridding
this method and providing a custom card template.

methods.name: generateRequestUrls

parameters.name: cardCount
parameters.description: - The number of cards which will be displayed in the To-Do Panel.

methods.description: Provides custom request URLs specific to the To-Do Panel.

methods.name: getNoDataText

returnValue.description: The text for the "No Data" message.

methods.description: Retrieves the text for the "No Data" message for the To-Do Panel.

methods.name: onDataReceived

returnValue.description: A promise that resolves when the data has been processed.

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: - The data received from the request.

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: - Optional request options.

methods.description:
Handles the data received from a batch request.
This hook can be used to process the data before it is displayed.

symbols.name: sap.cux.home.ToDoPanel
symbols.description: Abstract Panel class for managing and storing To-Do cards.

properties.name: baseUrl
properties.description: Specifies the base URL for batching requests sent from the panel.

properties.name: countUrl
properties.description: Specifies the URL for fetching the count of requested to-do cards.

properties.name: dataUrl
properties.description: Specifies the URL from where the to-do cards should be fetched.

properties.name: targetAppUrl
properties.description: Specifies the URL of the target application associated with the to-do cards.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID for the new control, generated automatically if an ID is not provided

parameters.name: settings
parameters.description: Initial settings for the new control

constructor.description: Constructor for a new To-Dos Panel.

methods.name: generateCardTemplate

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID for the template.

parameters.name: context
parameters.description: The context for the template.

methods.description: Generates the card template for the Current Panel.

methods.name: generateRequestUrls

parameters.name: cardCount
parameters.description: - The number of cards to retrieve.

methods.description: Generates request URLs for fetching data based on the specified card count.

methods.name: getNoDataText

returnValue.description: The text for the "No Data" message.

methods.description: Get the text for the "No Data" message.

methods.name: onDataReceived

parameters.name: results
parameters.description: - Data retrieved from the batch call.

parameters.name: options
parameters.description:
- Additional options for parsing the data.
Structure may vary based on the backend service.

methods.description:
A promise that resolves when the data has been processed.
This method can be overridden to perform additional data processing operations.

methods.name: getSelectedKey

If no selected key is set, it defaults to the first item.

methods.name: refreshData

returnValue.description: A promise that resolves when the section is successfully refreshed.

methods.description: Asynchronously refreshes the section by forcing all inner panels to be reloaded.
